notes: Minimum current for 5 VDC output is 50 mA. Some smaller projects may not be able to achieve this. If your project cannot exceed this limitation use a seperate charger and boost module instead.

Another option to create a minimum current is to add a load across the output to create a leakage current. In this case you can add a 100Ω resistor or some high brightness LEDs, however keep in mind this will drain your battery faster.
